channel.title: Can't load python scripts (Asgarnia)
channel.description:
Right, so here's my problem.
I've just downloaded this source to check it out (Asgarnia 377 based on Runesource), and when it begins to load the python scripts, it gives me an error.
Here's the error:
[code]INFO: Loading python scripts... java.lang.NullPointerException at com.asgarniars.rs2.util.ScriptManager.loadScripts(ScriptManager.java:133) at com.asgarniars.rs2.Server.run(Server.java:144) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:724)[/code]
I think it's not reading the scripts. I think this, because in the ScriptManager this is where the error occurs.
[code=java] engine.eval(new InputStreamReader(new FileInputStream(child)));[/code]
Is it because I do not have the proper program to run Python scripts? I've never really tried Python in my life.
Any help would be greatly appreciated, thanks :).

item.title: Can't load python scripts (Asgarnia)
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

Right, so here’s my problem.

I’ve just downloaded this source to check it out (Asgarnia 377 based on Runesource), and when it begins to load the python scripts, it gives me an error.

Here’s the error:

INFO: Loading python scripts... java.lang.NullPointerException at com.asgarniars.rs2.util.ScriptManager.loadScripts(ScriptManager.java:133) at com.asgarniars.rs2.Server.run(Server.java:144) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:724)

I think it’s not reading the scripts. I think this, because in the ScriptManager this is where the error occurs.

engine.eval(new InputStreamReader(new FileInputStream(child)));

Is it because I do not have the proper program to run Python scripts? I’ve never really tried Python in my life.

Any help would be greatly appreciated, thanks :).
